T02D1740:107a-1: t'a ragu hya s'a dha nam /
T02D1740:107a-3: sgrol ma'i gsang ba'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1740:107a-4: mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1740:107a-5: mchog dang thun mong 'dod pa dang //
T02D1740:107a-6: bar chod nyer 'tshe zhi ba dang //
T02D1740:107a-8: phrin las rnam bzhi bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D1740:107a-9: lha mo gsang ba'i sgrub thabs bshad //
T02D1740:107a-10: dang po nyams pa'i skyon bral zhing //
T02D1740:107a-11: brtson 'grus ldan pa'i skyes bu yis //
T02D1740:107a-12: shin tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su //
T02D1740:107a-13: mandala khru gang tshad du bya //
T02D1740:107a-14: dri chen dri chus chag chag gdab //
T02D1740:107a-15: mchod pa lnga ldan ras ris dgram //
T02D1740:107a-16: phyi nang bar chod zhi bar blta //
T02D1740:107a-17: stan la legs 'dug nub tu blta //
T02D1740:107a-18: skad cig lha bsam 'od kyis su //
T02D1740:107a-19: srid gsum zhing sbyangs spyan drangs la //
T02D1740:107a-20: yan lag bdun pos rgyud dag byas //
T02D1740:107a-21: tshad med bzhi bsam stong nyid bsgom //
T02D1740:107a-22: aa las me byung gru gsum dbyibs //
T02D1740:107a-23: dkar po bsams la de stengs su //
T02D1740:107a-24: aa bsam zhu bas lha mo bskyed //
T02D1740:107a-25: mdog smug bong thung thod phreng can //
T02D1740:107a-26: zhal gcig phyag gnyis dgod pa'i gdangs //
T02D1740:107a-27: rus pa'i phreng bas sku brgyan cing //
T02D1740:107a-28: me dpung 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02D1740:107a-29: phyag g-yas mda' gzhu rab tu 'dzin //
T02D1740:107a-30: autpala thod pa byang sems gang //
T02D1740:107a-31: g-yon pa thod dkar 'dzin pa bskyed //
T02D1740:107a-32: snying gar ae yi cha byad la //
T02D1740:107a-34: ye shes drangs pa mchod pa ni //
T02D1740:107a-35: tshig tu ma yin blo yis dbul //
T02D1740:107a-36: bzhis bstim byin brlab dbang bskur bya //
T02D1740:107a-37: bskyed la gsang sngags yid la bzlas //
T02D1740:107a-38: kha dog lnga ldan snying gar bsam //
T02D1740:107a-39: ched du bzlas pa bya ba ni //
T02D1740:107a-40: aom a'a: aa dhi si tu h'um /
T02D1740:107a-42: bzhi'am gcig dang bdun pa grub //
T02D1740:107a-43: thun bar gtor ma yang yang dbul //
T02D1740:107a-44: ming dang gtam yang gsang spyod bya //
T02D1740:107a-45: bzhi las me sur bde ba dbab //
T02D1740:107a-46: bskyil la lhan skyes bde ba bsgom //
T02D1740:107a-48: 'dod pa'i yon tan de bkug la //
T02D1740:107a-49: mtshan ldan snod du bkug byas la //
T02D1740:107a-50: rtags rdzogs longs spyod gzhan du ma ni //
T02D1740:107b-0: phrin @107b las rnam bzhi skabs dang sbyar //
T02D1740:107b-1: rin chen dang 'dra sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D1740:107b-2: 'jigs pa kun sgrol bde ba ster //
T02D1740:107b-3: nad med gnod rnams rang bzhin 'gyur //
T02D1740:107b-4: phongs pa kun sgrol 'byor par ldan //
T02D1740:107b-5: sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur 'gyur //
T02D1740:107b-7: lhag pa'i lha yi zhal mthong shog / bar chod nye bar zhi gyur nas //
T02D1740:107b-8: 'gro rnams de yi zhal mthong shog / sgrol ma gsang ba'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1740:107b-9: dpal rtag pa'i rdo rje lung bstan bas bkod pa /
T02D1740:107b-10: gsang ba zam tog ces bya ba rdzogs so /
T02D1740:107b-12: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ra ta dhar dang /
